pasteshare.title: PasteShare
pasteshare.description: Share your text snippets securely and easily.

pasteshare_ui.placeholder_password: Optional - leave empty for open access
pasteshare_ui.login_for_more: Log in for longer durations or no expiration
pasteshare_ui.slug_hint: Letters, numbers, dashes and underscores only

fileshare.title: FileShare
fileshare.description: Share your files securely and easily.
fileshare.subtitle: Upload and share your files easily
fileshare.click_to_select: or click to select a file
fileshare.network_error: Network error — could not create share
fileshare.never_expires_desc: This file will remain available indefinitely
fileshare.login_for_more: Log in for longer durations (up to {{max}} days) or no expiration and larger files (up to 500MB)
fileshare.slug_hint: Letters, numbers, dashes and underscores only
fileshare.password_placeholder: Optional - leave empty for open access
fileshare.qr_info: Scan this QR code to download the file
fileshare.duration_in_1_day: This file will expire in 1 day
fileshare.duration_in_x_days: This file will expire in {{count}} days
fileshare.duration_in_1_week: This file will expire in 1 week
fileshare.duration_in_x_weeks: This file will expire in {{count}} weeks
fileshare.duration_in_1_month: This file will expire in 1 month
fileshare.duration_in_x_months: This file will expire in {{count}} months
fileshare.duration_in_x_years: This file will expire in {{count}} year(s)
fileshare.locked_message: You must be logged in to share files.
